name: DailyBriefing
summary: Coordinate recurring intelligence briefings for knowledge workers.
description: Collects the latest updates, synthesizes highlights, and distributes a concise summary to subscribed personas.

task_graph.description: Aggregate relevant sources and headlines for the day.
Compose the briefing tailored to the requesting persona.

acceptance_criteria: Brief includes top three priority items
References at least two distinct sources

name: WeeklyPerformanceReview
summary: Review progress metrics and surface insights for leadership.
description: Aggregates task outcomes, highlights blockers, and prepares talking points for the upcoming leadership sync.

task_graph.description: Pull the latest key performance indicators from connected systems.
Analyze changes and annotate any anomalies.

escalation_policy.notes: Escalate to leadership enablement when deliverable slips.
